definition: Union of Myanmar, official name of Burma 1998-2010
Myanmar (formerly Burma) (abbr. for 緬甸|缅甸[Mian3 dian4])
suburbs or outskirts/one of the five degrees of official mourning attire in dynastic China/official in charge of fields (old)
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: People in Burma or in the Union of Myanmar are indeed helpless.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸跟緬甸聯邦的百姓確實求助無門。
